network_overview: The capture contains only IMS-anchored VoLTE/VoNR SIP signaling over SCTP; no user-plane (RTP/UDP) or EPC/5GC control (GTP, Diameter) is present. All 20 voice calls failed—7 cancelled by the user, 13 timed-out waiting for 200 OK—so the network delivered zero completed voice sessions during the 36-minute window.

observations.finding: 100 % call failure rate; 0 % of INVITEs reached connected state
No RTP bearer visible; media plane never established
SIP 180/183 early-dialog responses arrive, but final 200 OK is either missing or arrives too late (> 8 s)
13 calls terminated with internal BYE carrying 'PS to CS Handover' or 'User Triggered' cause, indicating bearer setup failure

root_causes.description: The SIP session proceeds normally (INVITE→100→183→PRACK→UPDATE→180) but the downstream EPS/5GC dedicated-bearer activation never completes, so the S-CSCF never sends a 200 OK. After 8-860 s the UE or MME/AMF abandons the attempt and releases the call with BYE/487 or internal BYE.
root_causes.impact: All voice calls drop; subscribers experience ‘call failed’ or ‘network busy’; no revenue-generating traffic.
evidence_refs: Call:ffll43qaga4q76d36gy4344yyw4g0ggl (duration 859 s, BYE with PS-to-CS Handover)
Tx:pkt_27 (180 Response but no 200 OK within 8 s)

root_causes.description: For user-cancelled calls the 180 Ringing arrives, yet the called UE never answers; the originating UE therefore CANCELs after ~30 s. This points to either radio paging failure or the terminating side never receiving the alerting indication.
root_causes.impact: Perceived poor reachability; call-completion ratio drops.

recommendations.action: Check MME/AMF logs for dedicated-bearer ACTIVATE DEFAULT/DEDICATED EPS BEARER CONTEXT REQUEST timeouts that match the failing call-ids
recommendations.rationale: Bearer timeout is the direct reason the S-CSCF withholds 200 OK; fixing QoS-flow/EPS-bearer setup will restore calls

recommendations.action: Verify PCRF Rx/Gx session establishment: ensure the AA-Request for media-flow AVPs is answered with AA-Answer=SUCCESS
recommendations.rationale: Missing PCC rules prevent bearer creation; align PCRF profile with voice QCI=1/5QI=1

recommendations.action: Validate paging and alerting on the terminating side: inspect S1-AP/NGAP Paging and RAN UE Context Setup for the called IMSIs
recommendations.rationale: Late or failed paging explains why 180 Ringing is sent but the user never actually hears the phone ring

recommendations.action: Enable SIP INFO/UPDATE early-media negotiation and shorten T9 (ringing) timer from 60 s to 30 s to release resources faster
recommendations.rationale: Reduces hung-call duration and improves radio-resource utilisation while root-cause is fixed

session_analysis.signaling_health: SIP over SCTP is syntactically clean (no 5xx, no retransmissions), but every dialog fails to reach 200 OK → state-machine incomplete
session_analysis.user_plane_health: No RTP flows observed; dedicated bearer never established → user-plane totally absent
session_analysis.voice_quality: No MOS scores possible—no media stream; from signaling view, post-dial delay > 8 s violates ITU E.721 (< 3 s)
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: SIP signaling succeeds up to 180/183, but absence of GTP-U/UDP-RTP shows bearer-setup failure is the blocking step

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant UE as 'UE (IPv6)'
    participant P as 'P-CSCF'
    participant S as 'S-CSCF'
    participant MME as 'MME/AMF'
    participant RAN as 'eNB/gNB'
    UE->>P: INVITE
    P->>S: INVITE
    S->>MME: Create Bearer Request (QCI=1)
    MME-->>S: (no response / timeout)
    S->>UE: 183 Session Progress
    S->>UE: 180 Ringing
    Note over UE,S: 8-860 s wait
    UE->>P: CANCEL (cause=200 Call Rejected By User)
    P->>S: CANCEL
    S->>UE: 487 Request Terminated
    UE->>P: ACK
